mathematica: Table[1 + Floor[Sqrt[n + 2] + 1/2] - Floor[Sqrt[n + 1] + 1/2], {n, 0,100}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, May 26 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) v=[]; for(n=0,200,v=concat(v,1+issquare(5+4*n))); v(MAGMA) [1+Floor(Sqrt(n+2)+1/2)-Floor(Sqrt(n+1)+1/2) : n in [0..100]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, May 26 2015
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 02 2001
